metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000480 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Smarty 3 before 3.1.32 is vulnerable to a PHP code injection when callingfetch() or display() functions on custom resources that does not sanitizetemplate name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

smarty3 - 3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3').
